mapper.select: select id,title,acSubmit,totalSubmit from onlinejudge.problem where visible='1' order by id desc limit #{start},#{num}
select count(id) from onlinejudge.problem where visible='1'
select id,title,createTime,visible,authorName from problem where title like "%"#{key}"%" order by id desc limit #{start},#{num}
select visible from problem where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update problem set visible=#{visible} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into problem(title, des, input, output, inputExample, outputExample, hint, acSubmit, totalSubmit,createTime,authorName,visible) values(#{title},#{des},#{input},#{output},#{inputExample},#{outputExample},#{hint},#{acSubmit},#{totalSubmit},#{createTime},#{authorName},#{visible});
